casebody.data:
ADOPTION OF YEIRA.1 18-P-1480 Appeals Court of Massachusetts. Entered: May 22, 2019

In Essex Division of the Probate and Family Court No. ES5A0094CW, the custody decree is affirmed. In Essex Division of the Probate and Family Court No. ES17A0054CW, the decree terminating parental rights to Yeira is affirmed.
